tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE files_and_documents (
  file_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  file_name VARCHAR(255),
  file_type VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  upload_date TIMESTAMP,
  shared_with VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE files (
  file_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  file_name VARCHAR(255),
  file_path VARCHAR(255),
  uploaded_by_user_id UUID,
  uploaded_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Files (
    file_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name STRING,
    file_type STRING,
    file_size INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    last_modified TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Teams (
    team_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name STRING,
    team_leader STRING,
    team_size INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE TeamMembers (
    member_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    member_name STRING,
    team_id UUID,
    role STRING,
    join_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE files (
    file_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name STRING,
    uploaded_by STRING,
    upload_date TIMESTAMP,
    file_size INT
)

CREATE TABLE documents (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_title STRING,
    created_by STRING,
    creation_date TIMESTAMP,
    document_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE team_members (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_name STRING,
    role STRING,
    department STRING,
    email STRING,
    phone_number STRING
)

CREATE TABLE shared_files (
    share_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_id INT,
    shared_with STRING,
    shared_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE files (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name TEXT,
    file_type TEXT,
    uploaded_by TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE members (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_name TEXT,
    team_id INT,
    join_date DATE,
    role TEXT
);
